Our app collects and monitors specific information about your device including your hardware model, build model, RAM, storage; unique device identifiers like IMEI, serial number, SSAID, AAID; SIM information that includes network operator, roaming state, MNC and MCC codes, WIFI information that includes MAC address and mobile network information to uniquely identify the devices and ensure that no unauthorized device acts on your behalf to prevent frauds. This also helps us in enriching your credit profile and assessing your credit worthiness.

Our app requires this permission to detect references and to auto fill the data during your loan application process for seamless user journey. Also, app collects and monitors your contact\'s information which includes name, phone numbers, account type, contact last modified, favorites and other optional data like relationship and structural address to enrich your financial profile. This also helps us to assess your risk profile and to determine your loan eligibility.

We collect and monitor the information about the location of your device to provide serviceability of your loan application, to reduce risk associated with your loan application and to provide pre-approved customised loan offers. This also helps us to verify the address, make a better credit risk decision and expedite your KYC process.

We require camera access so that you can easily scan or capture required KYC documents and save time by allowing us to auto-fill relevant data or to initiate an audio/video call for KYC purpose. This ensures that you are provided with a seamless experience while using the application.
Please note that certain information that is required mandatorily to perform your credit risk assessment is securely shared with our registered third-party service provider.
By continuing you agree to our Privacy Policy & Terms of Services and receive communication from Payzout via SMS, E-Mail and WhatsApp
